verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Faith is the victory!
Faith is the victory!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Oh, glorious victory,
That overcomes the world.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Encamped along
the hills of light,
Ye Christian soldiers, rise,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And press the battle
ere the night
Shall veil
the glowing skies.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Against the foe
in vales below
Let all our strength
be hurled;

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Faith is the victory,
we know
That overcomes the world.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
His banner
over us is love,
Our sword
the Word of God;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We tread the road
the saints above
With shouts
of triumph trod.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
By faith, they like
a whirlwind’s breath
Swept on
o’er ev’ry field;

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
The faith by which
they conquered Death
Is still
our shining shield.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
On ev’ry hand
the foe we find
drawn up
in dread array;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Let tents of ease
be left behind,
and onward
to the fray.

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Salvation’s helmet
on each head,
with truth
all girt about,

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines:
The earth shall tremble
’neath our tread,
and echo
with our shout.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
To him
that overcomes the foe,
white raiment
shall be giv’n;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Before the angels
he shall know
his name
confessed in heav’n.

verse.name: v4c
v4d
verse.lines:
We’ll vanquish
all the hosts of night,
in Jesus’
conqu’ring name.
